posts.post_content:
I have doubles of this card.

As I need some cash to pay paypal, I'd prefer to sell the EX/MC [so graded by the well-respected seller I bought it from] for $225, delivered.  
This card is on sale now. [Note that this card is in a handcut plastic holder and don't be confused by the top borderline.]

If my #1 doesn't sell by noon tomorrow, I'll offer my second for $160.  This card can be reserved conditionally [If the other doesn't sell by noon tomorrow, this goes on sale then].

No pm's, please; my box is full.  You can email me at [url]djdoremus@msn.com[/url].
If you're reserving #2, post it officially on this thread for the sake of propriety.

Thanks.

Doug
